text: <https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/pull/16> is up for public scrutiny :slightly_smiling_face: it merged the different places where Python dependencies where specified into one place: _setup.py_’s _install_requires_. The vagrant bootstrap file is modified to use them and the PR shows an example of (admittedly on my own macbook) installing Sawtooth Lake cleanly in a virtualenv.

attachments.title: install_requires as the one place for requirements by trbs · Pull Request #16 · hyperledger/sawtooth-core · GitHub
attachments.text: Merge the different places where Python dependencies are specified into one (DRY) place. This should make it easier to maintain the list since there is only one place where they are specified. The...
